The claim was shared by an Australian: based Facebook user and has been shared more than 460 times.
The post compares the progress of develo: 19 vaccine with other areas of medical research, stating that there are no vaccines for HIV, cancer, and the common cold after years of research.
The claim is misleading: as there are medications available for HIV that prevent the degradation of the immune system and reduce the risk of associated diseases.
According to a virologist: HIV and SARS-CoV-2 are very different viruses, and the Covid-19 vaccines are more likely to be successful as the virus does not mutate as quickly as other viruses like HIV, influenza, and the common cold.
